channel.title: Dragoncutter v1

item.title: Dragoncutter v1
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkers ultimatepkers
item.description:
@ultimatepkers wrote:

its my first ever plz inform me if i messed up

[code]//the new dragon_cutterv1 is out for testing please enjoy
program dragoncutter_v1;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/woodcutting.scar}
const
treecolor1=1794128;

procedure chop;
begin
repeat
if(findcolorspiraltolerance(x311,y191,treecolor1,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,25))then
mouse(x311,y3,true)
until(invfull)
if (invfull) then
dropall;
end;
begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
repeat
chop;
until(false);
end.[/code]

this is my fist script ever please inform me if i messed up on something
